NK072(nu)004:1: // sgyu 'phrul gyi dka' ba'i gnas snang ba lhar bsgrub
NK072(nu)004:2: pa dogs pa gcod pa lung rigs mu tig phreng
NK072(nu)004:4: dpal kun tu bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo //
NK072(nu)004:5: de la rtsa rgyud gsang ba snying po'i skabs su
NK072(nu)004:6: rgyu shes pa'i mtshan nyid lta ba dang sbyar nas
NK072(nu)004:7: dpyad par bya 'di ltar yod de /
NK072(nu)004:8: de la thog mar chos kyi dbyings don dam bden
NK072(nu)004:9: gnyis dbyer med kyi lta ba rtogs pa la sngon
NK072(nu)004:10: du 'gro ba dbyer med chig chod du gcod pa
NK072(nu)004:11: dang / rim gyis rtogs pa gnyis kyi dbang du
NK072(nu)004:12: byas nas tshul lnga tshig lnga'i gtan tshigs rim bzhin
NK072(nu)004:14: de'i rjes su sprul sku'i dgongs pa mtshan pa gtan
NK072(nu)004:15: tshigs rgyas par sems phyogs rgya mtsho'i shing rta pa
NK072(nu)004:16: sgyu 'phrul mkhan po snga ma dag gi dgongs bzhed
NK072(nu)004:17: gtso bor byas te dag pa dbyer med don dam
NK072(nu)004:18: bden pa snod bcud thams cad sku gsung thugs rdo
NK072(nu)004:19: rjer bsgrub pa'i tshul 'di dang po snang ba chos
NK072(nu)004:20: nyid yin par grub na gzhan dag la nges pa
NK072(nu)004:21: rim gyis rnyed par 'gyur bas de bshad par bya'o
NK072(nu)004:22: // snang ba 'di rang byung gi ye shes yes dang /
NK072(nu)004:24: chos nyid yin nam min la sogs pa'i gnad gcig tu shes par bya zhing /
NK072(nu)004:25: de yang snang ba 'di chos nyid min par 'dod pa dang /
NK072(nu)004:26: phyogs gzhan du dang yin par 'dod pa gsum yod /
NK072(nu)004:31: gshis chos nyid stong pa'am dbyings ye shes gnyis su
NK072(nu)004:32: med cing chos nyid rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i
NK072(nu)004:33: ye shes de rnam par dag cing don dam yin
NK072(nu)004:34: la / de 'gro drug rang ga ma'i snang ba
NK072(nu)004:35: la mi 'char bas bden zhen rang rgyud du dmigs
NK072(nu)004:36: pa'i tha mal gyi snang ba 'di chos nyid min
NK072(nu)004:37: la / te / kun rdzob bam log shes tshad
NK072(nu)004:38: min gyis bslad pa'i 'khrul ngo la yod pa'i 'khrul
NK072(nu)004:40: zhes theg pa 'og ma rnams dang /
NK072(nu)004:41: gsang sngags kyi dag mnyam chen po'i lta don mngon
NK072(nu)004:42: du mthong ba'i spyod yul du ma gyur pa rnams
NK072(nu)004:43: kyis bden pa ris chad dang mtshan zhen du blta
NK072(nu)004:45: rgyud kyi rgyal po 'di las bla med kyi rgyud
NK072(nu)004:46: pha dang ma rnams su'ang gsal por ma bstan cing
NK072(nu)004:47: sbas la ma rtogs pa rgyu mtshan du byas te
NK072(nu)004:48: rang rang gi zhe 'dod phyogs re la dam par
NK072(nu)004:49: blta zhing / snang ba chos nyid yin na blor
NK072(nu)004:50: mi chud pa'i skyon brjod rgol ba rang grub kyi
NK072(nu)004:51: gtan tshigs du ma dag snga byas so //
NK072(nu)004:52: gnyis pa de mi sgrubs 'gog gi sbyor ba 'god pa ni /
NK072(nu)004:53: de yin na kun khyab kyi tshad ma lung rigs
NK072(nu)004:54: man ngag gsum gyis 'gal ba 'du bar 'dod de
NK072(nu)004:55: / dang po theg pa rang rang gi skabs su
NK072(nu)004:56: nges pa rnyed pa'i drang don gyi lung ngam 'khrul
NK072(nu)004:57: snang dang chos nyid 'gal ba'i mdo tshig sogs dang
NK072(nu)004:58: / / phyi rgol la grub 'dod kyis gsang sngags /
NK072(nu)004:60: kyee lang+ka'i bdag po thams cad snang ba de gsang sngags ma yin /
NK072(nu)004:61: gal te gsang sngags yin na gsang sngags zhes brjod pa nyid dang 'gal la /
NK072(nu)004:62: sems can gyi 'du shes dang sangs rgyas kyi dgongs pa khyad med par 'gyur ro //
NK072(nu)004:66: spyir ni log rtog bsam yas pa //
NK072(nu)004:67: yod na yod pa ma yin te //
NK072(nu)004:68: so sor 'dzin rtog bag chags kyis //
NK072(nu)004:70: ci yang med la cir yang snang //
NK072(nu)004:71: don gyi snying po nyid las gol //
NK072(nu)004:74: dngos kun log rtog tsam nyid las //
NK072(nu)004:75: phra tsam skad cig yod min pas //
NK072(nu)004:76: 'khrul pa'i snang ba zhes su gsungs //
NK072(nu)004:81: khyod chos nyid yin na 'gro drug gi bden pa mthong bar thal te /
NK072(nu)004:82: 'gro ba la snang ba 'di chos nyid yin cing log rtog chos nyid de yod pa'i phyir /
NK072(nu)004:83: 'dod na thams cad mthong lam pa yin cing 'bad med du grol bar thal lo //
NK072(nu)004:85: da lta gyi snang ba chos can /
NK072(nu)004:86: khyod chos nyid yin na 'khrul pa'i snang ba rgyun chad par thal /
NK072(nu)004:87: snang ba 'di chos nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
NK072(nu)004:88: 'dod na 'khor ba dong sprugs par thal lo //
NK072(nu)004:91: khyod bem po rdzas can du thal /
NK072(nu)004:92: snang ba 'di chos nyid yin pa'i phyir /
NK072(nu)004:93: 'dod na 'gro drug gi snang ba 'di kho na ltar bden pa dang /
NK072(nu)004:94: stong nyid rtogs pa la sogs pa 'khrul bar thal ba'i skyon yong ngo //
NK072(nu)004:98: skye 'jig can gyi snang ba 'di chos nyid yin pa'i phyir ro //
NK072(nu)004:99: 'dod na chos nyid rtogs rung skye 'jig gi sdug bsngal las mi grol ba'i skyon yong ngo //
NK072(nu)004:100: zhes ji ltar snang ba ye nas sangs rgyas pa
NK072(nu)004:101: lta bu yin du mi rung ngo zhes smra ba
NK072(nu)004:102: byed cing snang stong gnyis med kyi mtha' la nges
NK072(nu)004:103: shes kyi thag ma chod pas stong pa'i rtsal snang
NK072(nu)004:104: ba / snang ba'i rang bzhin de yin par ma
NK072(nu)004:105: rtog pas rigs pa ltar snang ba du ma zhig
NK072(nu)004:107: gnyis pa phyogs gzhan du 'dod pa ni /
NK072(nu)004:108: ma rtog 'khrul ba'i dus na chos nyid min par rtogs pa'i dus na yin par 'dod pa dang /
NK072(nu)004:109: ma 'dres par yod pa'i ngos nas min la yongs rdzogs kyi ngos nas yin par 'dod pa dang /
NK072(nu)004:110: ngo bo'am bdag nyid gcig pu'i ngos nas yin pa
NK072(nu)004:111: mtshon tshul lam ldog pa tha dad pa'i ngos nas
NK072(nu)004:113: gsum pa chos nyid yin par 'dod pas rang lugs ni /
NK072(nu)004:118: phyogs du mas min par 'dod pa'i skyon 'gel ba'i
NK072(nu)004:119: lung rigs man ngag gsum gyis gnod pa ma grub
NK072(nu)004:120: ste / min par gsungs pa ni /
NK072(nu)004:121: snang ba chos nyid yin kyang ma rtog ste 'khrul pa'i snang ngo la dgongs te gsungs pa'o //
NK072(nu)004:123: gal te snang ba gsang sngags ma yin pa'i rjes
NK072(nu)004:124: su de las gzhan yang gsang sngags yod pa ma
NK072(nu)004:125: yin / gal te de las gzhan pa zhig gsang
NK072(nu)004:126: sngags yin na ni thams cad chos nyid du ma
NK072(nu)004:128: thams cad kyi rang bzhin mi snang ba de gsang sngags ma yin par /
NK072(nu)004:129: gal te mi snang ba de gsang sngags yin na ni gzhan mu chad pa yang /
NK072(nu)004:130: yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyid du 'gyur ro //
NK072(nu)004:133: yul dang shes par snang ba yang //
NK072(nu)004:134: rang byung ye shes rang snang zad //
NK072(nu)004:137: tha snyad gnyis kyi chos rnams ril //
NK072(nu)004:138: mnyam rdzogs bdag nyid chen po'i rgyan //
NK072(nu)004:140: gsum pa rigs pa'i skyon med de /
NK072(nu)004:141: dang po 'gro drug gi bden pa mthong ba thal /
NK072(nu)004:142: zhes pa de gshis yin tshul nas mthong bar thal zer ram /
NK072(nu)004:143: nges pa'i shes pa dang bcas te mthong bar thal zer /
NK072(nu)004:146: snang ba ma bcos chos kyi sku //
NK072(nu)004:147: rig pa ma sbyangs longs spyod rdzogs //
NK072(nu)004:148: thugs rje sprul pa'i sku ru shar //
NK072(nu)004:151: dbang po cer mthong chos nyid gsal //
NK072(nu)004:152: snang ba rgya yan rig pa'i klong //
NK072(nu)004:155: cir yang ma sgrib ye shes mchog /
NK072(nu)004:156: thams cad ma 'dres yongs rdzogs gsal //
NK072(nu)004:159: ci snang chos nyid yin pas gshis yin tshul nas snang tshad chos nyid du snang zhing /
NK072(nu)004:160: snang tshad chos nyid mthong ba yin no //
NK072(nu)004:161: mthong na 'khor ba dong sprugs par thal lo zhe na /
NK072(nu)004:162: mthong yang rang ngo rang gis ma shes pas 'khor bar 'khyams pa yin te /
NK072(nu)004:163: 'khor ba dong sprugs pas skyon med do phyi ma ltar na /
NK072(nu)004:164: gtan tshigs la nges pas mi khyab ste /
NK072(nu)004:165: chos nyid mthong yang nges pa'i shes pa ma skyes pa ni /
NK072(nu)004:166: rgyal bu dmangs 'khyams rgyal po las mi 'gyur yang /
NK072(nu)004:167: rang gzhan gyis der ngo mi 'tshal ba bzhin no //
NK072(nu)004:170: mngon sum snang ba'i ye shes la //
NK072(nu)004:171: sangs rgyas sems can khyad med kyang //
NK072(nu)004:172: rang dbang lam las mi gnas na //
NK072(nu)004:173: sems nyid bde bar spyod mi nus //
NK072(nu)004:175: mdo yi lam rim las kyang /
NK072(nu)004:176: grong khyer gsum gyi sems can rnams //
NK072(nu)004:177: thabs dang lhan cig mi gnas pas //
NK072(nu)004:178: bden pa mthong yang nges ma gnas //
NK072(nu)004:182: kun gzhi snang ba gnyis bral ba //
NK072(nu)004:183: rtag tu rang mtshan mthong gyur yang //
NK072(nu)004:184: zhen la snang bar ma gyur pas //
NK072(nu)004:185: mig gi mig bzhin ma rig pa'o //
NK072(nu)004:187: mthong ba rang gi nges shes skye dgos so zhe na /
NK072(nu)004:188: mthong ba'i yul la log shes 'khrul pa rgyun chad par thal ba'i skyon yong ngo //
NK072(nu)004:189: gnyis pa 'khrul snang rgyun chad par thal /
NK072(nu)004:190: zhes pa de 'gro drug gis chos nyid yin par
NK072(nu)004:191: ngo shes nas 'dug pa'i phyir ma 'khrul bar thal
NK072(nu)004:192: zer ram / ngo ma shes kyang ma 'khrul bar thal zer /
NK072(nu)004:193: snga ma ltar na gtan tshigs ma grub pa nyid kyis gong du brjod pa bzhin no //
NK072(nu)004:194: 'di ltar ma dag pa 'khrul snang spangs pa'i pha
NK072(nu)004:195: rol du dag pa ma 'khrul ba zhig gsar du
NK072(nu)004:197: 'khrul pa ngo bo nyid kyis dag pa ye shes yin pa'i phyir /
NK072(nu)004:198: de yin te sems can dang sangs rgyas kyi khyad
NK072(nu)004:199: par chos nyid kyi phye ba zhig ma yin par
NK072(nu)004:200: rmi lam gyi rgyu 'bras so sor snang ba bzhin
NK072(nu)004:201: du / kun btags kyi dbang gis blo so sor snang ba tsam la 'jog pa gang zhig /
NK072(nu)004:202: mtshan ma sna tshogs pa'i rang bzhin gyis dag pa'i phyir /
NK072(nu)004:203: de gnyis dngos su bsgrub mi nus te dngos 'gal yin pa'i phyir /
NK072(nu)004:204: thag khra dang sbrul bzhin no zhe na /
NK072(nu)004:205: de'ang sbrul ma dmigs pa nyid thag khra la brten
NK072(nu)004:206: nas snang ba bzhin du chos la brten pa'i chos
NK072(nu)004:207: can yin pas chab bram dang chu ngo bo gcig
NK072(nu)004:208: pa bzhin no // de'ang phyi ma ltar na /
NK072(nu)004:209: ngo ma shes pa de kas 'khrul pa yin te /
NK072(nu)004:210: 'khrul ba'i snang ba rgyun chad pa'i skyon mi 'ong ngo //
NK072(nu)004:211: gsum pa dang bzhi pa bem po rdzas can dang
NK072(nu)004:212: skye 'jig can du thal ba la sogs pa de
NK072(nu)004:213: gshis yin tshul nas thal zer ram /
NK072(nu)004:214: ma rtogs 'khrul pa'i snang ngo la thal zer /
NK072(nu)004:216: gtan tshig ma grub cing mngon sum gyis gsal lo zhe na /
NK072(nu)004:217: mngon sum 'khrul ma 'khrul gyi brtag pa dris shig dang /
NK072(nu)004:218: phyi ma ltar 'khrul par snang yang de don la med de /
NK072(nu)004:219: 'khrul pa rtsis su mi che ba nyid do //
NK072(nu)004:221: chos nyid min na lung man ngag rigs pa gsum dang 'gal te /
NK072(nu)004:222: lung man ngag dang pos chos nyid yin par bstan pa rnams so //
NK072(nu)004:225: snang ba chos nyid min na chos nyid chad par thal /
NK072(nu)004:226: 'dod na mu stegs chad pa bden par thal /
NK072(nu)004:227: snang ba chos nyid min pa'i phyir ro //
NK072(nu)004:229: snang ba chos nyid min na stong pa'ang chos nyid min par thal /
NK072(nu)004:230: 'dod na chos nyid gtan nas mi srid pa thal ba'i skyon yong ngo //
NK072(nu)004:231: ci'i phyir na snang stong ngo bo gcig pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
NK072(nu)004:233: snang ba chos nyid min na 'gro drug gis lam
NK072(nu)004:234: nyams su blangs kyang grol thar gtan nas mi 'byung
NK072(nu)004:235: bar thal / 'dod na lam nyams su blangs pa don med du thal /
NK072(nu)004:236: 'gro drug gi snang ba chos nyid min pa'i phyir ro //
NK072(nu)004:237: snang stong la 'brel ba med par thal bas snang ba bden cing rtag par thal ba'am /
NK072(nu)004:238: min kyang 'byung na gshags ma las kyang myu gu 'byung bar thal ba dang /
NK072(nu)004:239: grol thal de 'dus byas su thal ba la sogs pa'i skyon 'byung ngo //
NK072(nu)004:241: snang ba chos nyid min na chos nyid mngon sum
NK072(nu)004:242: du rtogs shing bden pa mthong ba rgyan chad par
NK072(nu)004:243: thal / 'dod na chos byed pa don med par thal /
NK072(nu)004:244: snang ba chos nyid min pa'i phyir /
NK072(nu)004:245: snang ba min kyang stong pas mthong ngo zhe na /
NK072(nu)004:247: stong mkhan kyang med pa'i skyon yong ngo //
NK072(nu)004:249: snang ba chos nyid min zhing 'khrul pa yin na
NK072(nu)004:250: thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyang 'khrul par thal
NK072(nu)004:251: / 'dod na sangs rgyas kyang don med par thal /
NK072(nu)004:252: snang tshad 'khrul pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
NK072(nu)004:253: des na snang ba chos nyid du mi 'dod pa ni /
NK072(nu)004:254: rang snang la yul du mthong /
NK072(nu)004:255: phyogs med la phyogs su bzung nas gnas lugs kyi don ma go bar /
NK072(nu)004:257: ye shes bsam yas rang bzhin las //
NK072(nu)004:258: rnam rtog d+r+wa bas so sor bcing //
NK072(nu)004:259: de nyid rang gsal ma rtogs pas //
NK072(nu)004:260: long ba'i grong khyer chen por 'gro //
NK072(nu)004:263: phyogs med lhun grub ma gtogs pas //
NK072(nu)004:264: lta ba'i 'dod lugs du ma byung //
NK072(nu)004:265: blo dang chos su ma 'dres pas //
NK072(nu)004:266: mnyam nyid lta la phyogs su zhen //
NK072(nu)004:267: kun shes rig pa mi skyes pas //
NK072(nu)004:268: yul med gcig pa ris su gcod //
NK072(nu)004:269: rang byung ye shes ma shar bas //
NK072(nu)004:270: mun pa'i klong na tshod kyis mjal //
NK072(nu)004:272: phyogs gzhan du 'dod pa yang mi 'thad de /
NK072(nu)004:273: ma rtogs pa'i dus kyi chos nyid min pa dang /
NK072(nu)004:274: rtogs pa'i dus kyi yin pa gnyis gang bden /
NK072(nu)004:275: snga ma bden na phyi ma 'gal la //
NK072(nu)004:276: phyi ma bden na snga ma 'gal lo //
NK072(nu)004:277: de gnyis mnyam pa yin pa'ang mi 'thad de /
NK072(nu)004:278: gzhi gcig la yin min gnyis 'gal bas mi rigs so //
NK072(nu)004:279: yang ma rtogs dus min na /
NK072(nu)004:280: rtogs pa'i dus yin pa'ang 'gal te /
NK072(nu)004:281: de rtogs pa ma yin zhing log shes su thal ba'i skyon 'ong ngo //
NK072(nu)004:282: gnyis pa ma 'dres pa de yongs rdzogs yin nam min /
NK072(nu)004:283: min na yongs rdzogs kyi nges tshigs min la /
NK072(nu)004:284: yin na yongs rdzogs kyi nges nas chos nyid yin pa ltar /
NK072(nu)004:285: ma 'dres pa'i ngos nas kyang yin par thal lo //
NK072(nu)004:286: 'dod na ma 'dres pa'i ngos nas chos nyid min pa'i dam bca' der thal /
NK072(nu)004:287: ma 'dres pa nyid yongs su rdzogs pa'i phyir ro //
NK072(nu)004:288: de bzhin ma 'dres pa'i ngos nas brjod par bya'o //
NK072(nu)004:290: mtshon tshul de ngo bo yin nam min /
NK072(nu)004:291: min na ngo bo gcig pa'i dam bca' bud /
NK072(nu)004:292: yin na ngo bo chos nyid yin pa ltar /
NK072(nu)004:293: mtshon tshul kyang chos nyid yin par thal /
NK072(nu)004:294: 'dod na min pa'i dam bca' thal /
NK072(nu)004:295: ngo bo'i mtshon tshul yin pa'i phyir /
NK072(nu)004:296: khyab pa ma grub ce na /
NK072(nu)004:297: gser las byed pa'i gzugs sna tshogs la gser gyis ma khyab ces mgo basgre'o //
NK072(nu)004:298: spyi don gsum pa chos nyid yin par gtan la dbab na /
NK072(nu)004:300: 'gro drug gi snang ba 'di ma spangs pa'i ngos nas chos nyid yin la /
NK072(nu)004:301: mi ldan pa'i ngos nas min par gsungs te /
NK072(nu)004:302: brda don sprad pa'i ngos nas yin /
NK072(nu)004:303: bla ma zur po che dpal he ru kas chos
NK072(nu)004:304: kun ji ltar snang yang rang byung gi ye shes
NK072(nu)004:305: rang snang bas / chos nyid du ma gyur pa'i
NK072(nu)004:306: chos gcig kyang med de snang ba chos nyid yin
NK072(nu)004:307: rang snang bas / gsungs / shar kahthoga pa yab sras gsum gyis bzhed pa /
NK072(nu)004:308: chos snang ba thams cad 'khrul snang bsal du med
NK072(nu)004:309: pa ngo bo nyid kyis ye shes rdo rje'i dkyil
NK072(nu)004:310: 'khor ni / rang bzhin lhun gyis grub pa'i btags gzhi tsam du rgya cher gsungs shing /
NK072(nu)004:311: rgyal ba rong klong dag gis kyang de ltar bzhed par mngon no //
NK072(nu)004:313: nang rgyud sde gsum du bzhugs pa du ma nyid las /
NK072(nu)004:315: 'gro drug gi snang ba 'di chos can /
NK072(nu)004:316: chos nyid rang snang yin te /
NK072(nu)004:317: yul du 'dzin pa 'khrul ba'i snang ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
NK072(nu)004:318: yang snang ba rang snang phyogs med yin te /
NK072(nu)004:319: phyogs su 'dzin pa 'khrul pa yin pa'i phyir ro //
NK072(nu)004:321: yul 'dzin dang phyogs 'dzin 'khrul pa yin pas /
NK072(nu)004:322: 'khrul pa yin pa'i phyir gshis chos nyid yin no //
NK072(nu)004:323: des na snang ba chos nyid yin pa des ma
NK072(nu)004:324: rtogs 'khrul pa yin pa de kas gshis chos nyid
NK072(nu)004:325: yin no // de ltar yin pa de kas gshis phyogs med yin /
NK072(nu)004:326: gshis phyogs med yin pas phyogs 'dzin 'khrul pa yin no //
NK072(nu)004:327: de bas na snang ba rang snang phyogs med rang grol chos nyid chen por grol ba ni /
NK072(nu)004:328: gsang sngags kyi dgongs pa'i phug longs pas snang ba
NK072(nu)004:329: lhar bsgrub pa la thog mar 'di la nges pa
NK072(nu)004:330: rnyed pa'i tshe na chos nyid kyi rigs pa grub
NK072(nu)004:331: ste / gzhan rigs pa gsum po shugs kyis grub 'ong bas de dag ni /
NK072(nu)004:332: dpal ldan zur ba'i bshad srol dang /
NK072(nu)004:333: rgyal ba rong klong gnyis kyi gzhung las legs par shes dgos shing /
NK072(nu)004:334: 'di rtogs ldan chos rje kahthoga pa mkhas grub sh+aakya rdo rje'i bzhed pa'i tshul bsnyad pa yin no //
NK072(nu)004:335: gang zhig bstan pas dpal ldan snying po'i gnad //
NK072(nu)004:336: tshul bzhin sems pa'i skal bzang thob byed pa //
NK072(nu)004:337: yongs 'dzin dam pa'i tshogs kyi zhabs pad mor //
NK072(nu)004:338: gus pas 'dud do mchog thun dngos grub stsol //
NK072(nu)004:339: rtog ges chos nyid mjal ba'i byis pa dang //
NK072(nu)004:340: mtshon thabs gtan tshigs mi dgos ston pa la //
NK072(nu)004:341: dpyod bral thos ldan khengs pa'i mkhas rlobs rnams //
NK072(nu)004:342: rdo rje theg pa'i lam las phyi rol sogs //
NK072(nu)004:343: zung 'jug sgyu 'phrul d+r+wa ba rgyud kyi rgyal //
NK072(nu)004:344: legs bshad gzhung brgya bla ma'i drin dag las //
NK072(nu)004:345: mthong ba'i zab gnad dpyod cing bsdus 'dis kyang //
NK072(nu)004:346: skal bzang mtshar sdug byed pa'i rgyan gyur cig //
NK072(nu)004:347: chos gral chen mo kah thog tu ris med pa'i
NK072(nu)004:348: bstan pa rin po che la dag pa'i 'dzum dkar
NK072(nu)004:349: 'bul ba sprul ming chos kyi rgya mtsho bas blo
NK072(nu)004:350: gsar bu dag la rgyud 'chad pa'i skabs su sbyar
NK072(nu)004:351: ba'o // rgyud kyi rgyal po gsang ba snying po'i don //
NK072(nu)004:352: rgyud rnam kun gyi rgyal po'i snying khu ru //
NK072(nu)004:353: nges par rnyed nas skal pa bzang po ru //
NK072(nu)004:354: 'di 'dra mjal ba tsam gyis yin par rtogs //
NK072(nu)004:355: 'on kyang snyigs ma las kyang snyigs ma'i dus //
NK072(nu)004:356: 'di 'drar gtan bde tshe 'di la reg pa'i //
NK072(nu)004:357: thabs mchog dor nas mi 'dod sdug bsngal rgyur //
NK072(nu)004:358: 'jug pa'i yid ni bdud kyi lcags kyu des //
NK072(nu)004:359: drangs pa kho nar mthong bas tshul 'di la //
NK072(nu)004:360: snying nas bsgom dang sgrub pa bya bar rtogs //
NK072(nu)004:361: de slad du'ang 'di na cung zad du //
NK072(nu)004:362: smras pas phan pa rang las dben pa ru //
NK072(nu)004:363: shes kyi gcig pur yid kyis 'du byed pas //
NK072(nu)004:364: spangs nas 'di dag sgrol ba'i lam bzang por //
NK072(nu)004:365: rtse gcig tu yang 'jug par bya snyams mod //
NK072(nu)004:366: de 'dra de yang bstan pa'i snying po nyid //
NK072(nu)004:367: shin tu nyams par gyur pa ma bzod nas //
NK072(nu)004:368: bdag gi kha nas gang byung 'di na thal //
